nodes.id: 行政院 (汪精卫国民政府)

zh-cn: 行政院 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府的最高行政机关，成立于1940年3月30日，解散于1945年8月16日。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Wang Jingwei regime, established on March 30, 1940, and dissolved on August 16, 1945.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府在南京建立的政权，由汪兆铭（汪精卫）等中国国民党中一部分主张与日本“和平”的人物所建立。
description.en: A regime established in Nanjing by the Reorganized National Government of the Republic of China, founded by Wang Jingwei and other figures from the Kuomintang who advocated for 'peace' with Japan.

nodes.id: 国民政府委员会 (汪精卫国民政府)

zh-cn: 国民政府委员会 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府的最高权力机关。
description.en: The highest authority of the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，汪精卫国民政府的创建者及首脑，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: Chinese politician, founder and head of the Wang Jingwei regime, served as the President of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，汪精卫国民政府的主要人物之一，在汪兆铭死后继任行政院院长。
description.en: Chinese politician, a key figure in the Wang Jingwei regime, who succeeded Wang Jingwei as President of the Executive Yuan after his death.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府政治人物，曾任行政院副院长。
description.en: A politician in the Wang Jingwei regime, served as the Vice President of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府政治人物，曾任行政院副院长。
description.en: A politician in the Wang Jingwei regime, served as the Vice President of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府官员，曾任行政院秘书长。
description.en: An official in the Wang Jingwei regime, served as Secretary-General of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府官员，曾任行政院秘书长。
description.en: An official in the Wang Jingwei regime, served as Secretary-General of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府官员，曾任行政院政务委员。
description.en: An official in the Wang Jingwei regime, served as a Political Affairs Commissioner of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府官员，曾任行政院政务委员。
description.en: An official in the Wang Jingwei regime, served as a Political Affairs Commissioner of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府官员，曾任行政院政务委员及参事厅长。
description.en: An official in the Wang Jingwei regime, served as a Political Affairs Commissioner and Director of the Counselors' Office of the Executive Yuan.

nodes.id: 中华民国内政部 (汪精卫国民政府)

zh-cn: 中华民国内政部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府行政院下设的部门。
description.en: A ministry under the Executive Yuan of the Wang Jingwei regime.

nodes.id: 警政部 (汪精卫国民政府)

zh-cn: 警政部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府行政院下设的部门，1941年并入内政部。
description.en: A ministry under the Executive Yuan of the Wang Jingwei regime, merged into the Ministry of the Interior in 1941.

nodes.id: 工商部 (汪精卫国民政府)

zh-cn: 工商部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府行政院下设的部门，1941年与农矿部合并为实业部。
description.en: A ministry under the Executive Yuan of the Wang Jingwei regime, merged with the Ministry of Agriculture and Mining in 1941 to form the Ministry of Industry.

nodes.id: 农矿部 (汪精卫国民政府)

zh-cn: 农矿部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府行政院下设的部门，1941年与工商部合并为实业部。
description.en: A ministry under the Executive Yuan of the Wang Jingwei regime, merged with the Ministry of Industry and Commerce in 1941 to form the Ministry of Industry.

nodes.id: 中华民国实业部 (汪精卫国民政府)

zh-cn: 中华民国实业部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 1941年由工商部、农矿部合并而成的汪精卫国民政府行政院下设部门。
description.en: A ministry under the Executive Yuan of the Wang Jingwei regime, formed in 1941 by the merger of the Ministry of Industry and Commerce and the Ministry of Agriculture and Mining.

nodes.id: 交通部 (汪精卫国民政府)

zh-cn: 交通部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府行政院下设的部门，1943年与水利委员会合并为建设部。
description.en: A ministry under the Executive Yuan of the Wang Jingwei regime, merged with the Water Conservancy Commission in 1943 to form the Ministry of Construction.

nodes.id: 水利委员会 (汪精卫国民政府)

zh-cn: 水利委员会 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府行政院下设的委员会，1943年与交通部合并为建设部。
description.en: A commission under the Executive Yuan of the Wang Jingwei regime, merged with the Ministry of Communications in 1943 to form the Ministry of Construction.

nodes.id: 建设部 (汪精卫国民政府)

zh-cn: 建设部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 1943年由交通部、水利委员会合并而成的汪精卫国民政府行政院下设部门。
description.en: A ministry under the Executive Yuan of the Wang Jingwei regime, formed in 1943 by the merger of the Ministry of Communications and the Water Conservancy Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的南京市，为汪精卫国民政府的首都。
description.en: Nanjing during the Republic of China period, served as the capital of the Wang Jingwei regime.

relationships.target: 行政院 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 行政院是汪精卫国民政府成立时设立的最高行政机关。
description.en: The Executive Yuan was the highest administrative body established at the founding of the Wang Jingwei regime.

relationships.source: 行政院 (汪精卫国民政府)
relationships.target: 国民政府委员会 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 行政院是汪精卫国民政府委员会下的最高行政机关。
description.en: The Executive Yuan was the highest administrative organ under the National Government Committee of the Wang Jingwei regime.

relationships.target: 行政院 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 汪兆铭自1940年3月31日起兼任行政院院长，直至1944年11月10日逝世。
description.en: Wang Jingwei served concurrently as President of the Executive Yuan from March 31, 1940, until his death on November 10, 1944.

relationships.target: 行政院 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 陈公博于1944年11月12日接替汪兆铭，担任行政院院长。
description.en: Chen Gongbo succeeded Wang Jingwei as President of the Executive Yuan on November 12, 1944.

relationships.target: 行政院 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 褚民谊于1940年3月31日被任命为行政院副院长。
description.en: Chu Minyi was appointed Vice President of the Executive Yuan on March 31, 1940.

relationships.target: 行政院 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 周佛海于1940年12月12日被任命为行政院副院长。
description.en: Zhou Fohai was appointed Vice President of the Executive Yuan on December 12, 1940.

relationships.source: 警政部 (汪精卫国民政府)
relationships.target: 中华民国内政部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 1941年，警政部并入内政部。
description.en: In 1941, the Ministry of Police Administration was merged into the Ministry of the Interior.

relationships.source: 工商部 (汪精卫国民政府)
relationships.target: 中华民国实业部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 1941年，工商部与农矿部合并为实业部。
description.en: In 1941, the Ministry of Industry and Commerce merged with the Ministry of Agriculture and Mining to form the Ministry of Industry.

relationships.source: 农矿部 (汪精卫国民政府)
relationships.target: 中华民国实业部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 1941年，农矿部与工商部合并为实业部。
description.en: In 1941, the Ministry of Agriculture and Mining merged with the Ministry of Industry and Commerce to form the Ministry of Industry.

relationships.source: 交通部 (汪精卫国民政府)
relationships.target: 建设部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 1943年，交通部与水利委员会合并为建设部。
description.en: In 1943, the Ministry of Communications merged with the Water Conservancy Commission to form the Ministry of Construction.

relationships.source: 水利委员会 (汪精卫国民政府)
relationships.target: 建设部 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 1943年，水利委员会与交通部合并为建设部。
description.en: In 1943, the Water Conservancy Commission merged with the Ministry of Communications to form the Ministry of Construction.

relationships.target: 行政院 (汪精卫国民政府)

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府的行政院是在原中华民国行政院的架构上建立的，并取代了其在沦陷区的职能。
description.en: The Executive Yuan of the Wang Jingwei regime was established based on the structure of the original Executive Yuan of the Republic of China and superseded its functions in the occupied territories.
